Tooltip_PetConsole: Una consola especial para administrar a tus mascotas
Tooltip_PetConsoleFragment: A damaged creature management console. This would have been used by Alterra scientists to tag their cloning experiments, as well as to terminate aggressive test subjects.
Tooltip_PetFabricator: Un constructor especial de mascotas que replica criaturas con fragmentos de ADN.
Tooltip_PetFabricatorFragment: A damaged piece of a creature clone fabricator. This would have been used by Alterra scientists to manipulate the genome of native creatures in the hope of controlling and weaponizing the beast.
EncyDesc_PetDna: With the destruction of the Aurora, experiments planned by the Alterra Corporation to pacify and weaponise the local fauna never progressed. These abandoned DNA sample containers appear to have come into contact with genetic material from various animals, triggering the collection process. With the right equipment, it might be possible to combine these samples with base materials to clone domestic variants of native creatures. Ideal for companionship in a lonely base.
EncyDesc_PetFabricator: A variant of the fabricators used day to day by billions, this piece of equipment was customised to fabricate cloned copies of various creatures using samples of their DNA. The device is programmed to manipulate the genome of the subject, pacifying the animal and giving human handlers control of the beasts behaviour. With a corresponding control console, this machine could be repurposed to create passive clones of some of the native creatures of planet 4546B, given the right genetic material to process.
EncyDesc_PetConsole: This console was designed to allow Alterra scientists to tag and label their cloning experiments as part of a secret project to tame and weaponise creatures on planet 4546B. With the untimely destruction of the Aurora, these experiments never progressed. The machine also provided fail safes to neutralise cloned creatures that may have shown signs of aggression. Paired with the right fabricator, and with some DNA samples and base materials, it might still work.
Alert_NaughtyBoy: Si quere tener una mascota comprese el marrano juego, esta barato. (a joke translation, tell me if you want something more serious)
Alert_PetDeadGoodBoy: Fuiste el mejor {PetType} que pudo haber!
Alert_SpawnError: No puedes aparecer a una mascota aquí!
Alert_PlayerMustBeInBase: Tienes que estar en una base para aparecer a una mascota!
Options_SkipCheck: Desactiva el chequeo de obstaculos al aparecer mascotas.
